dict.acceptation: 损害；使受伤；使伤心；使受皮肉之苦；
疼痛；感到疼痛；受痛苦；有坏处，有害；
受伤的；痛苦的；（受）损坏的；

sent.orig: Forgive those who unintentionally hurt usl. Do not be someone who is easily hurt by others.
sent.trans: 要原谅一个无心伤害人的人，不能做一个轻易被别人伤害的人。

sent.orig: Why I get hurt all the time, how ability get hurt?
sent.trans: 为什么我一直受伤，怎样才能不受伤？

sent.orig: How are you hurt? Where do you hurt and how painful is it?
sent.trans: 您是怎么受伤的？什么部位受伤？有多痛？

sent.orig: Hate to not necessarily hurt other people, but certainly hurt oneself.
sent.trans: 怨恨不一定会伤害别人，却一定会伤害自己。

sent.orig: Feel is a slut, to hurt you, but the more I love you more hurt you.
sent.trans: 感觉自己就是一个贱人，去伤害你，而且我越爱你就越伤害你。
